card.name: The Arbiter, Eternal
card.text: Whenever one or more cards enter or leave your sanctum, put a loyalty counter on The Arbiter. [0]: Put a card from your sanctum into your hand. [-2]: You get {VU}. You may cast a copy of a vertex sorcery from your command zone without paying its mana cost. (You still pay its vertex cost.) [-10]: You get an emblem with "You may spend {V} as though it were mana of any type. You get ten {V}."

card.name: Identity
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, reveal a card from your sanctum with mana value less than or equal to the damage dealt and put it into your hand. Whenever you cast a silver spell, sift 1.

card.name: Conspicuous Glimpse
card.text: Whenever one or more Avatars you control attack, choose one — • This creature deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 3 life. • Draw a card.

card.name: Warden of Secrets
card.text: Ward {1} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.) Noncreature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Other artifacts and enchantments you control have ward {1}.

card.name: RWB - Sacrifice
card.text: Lifelink When this creature enters, create two 1/1 red Spirit creature tokens. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: This creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.

Landfall — Whenever a land enters under your control, create a treasure token. {6}: Put the top card of your library onto the battlefield face-down as a land with "{T}: Add one mana of any color" and "Turn this face-up as a sorcery for its mana cost if its a permanent."

card.name: WBG - Counters
card.text: Infuse 1 (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature if it has none.) Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on a creature you control, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: The Arbiter's Oathwatcher
card.text: Other Avatars and Anima you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a token. If you do, create a 1/1 silver Avatar creature token.

card.name: IUB - Noncreatures
card.text: You may spent {V} as though it were {C} to cast this spell. When this creature enters, you may create a colorless 0/0 Fractal Horror creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Bloodbringer
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may put a decayed counter on target creature you control without one. If you do, that creature gains haste and you get {VU}. (A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat. Spend {V} to cast copies of Vertex spells.)

card.name: Terminus Seeker
card.text: Vigilance Whenever this creature enters or you realize a Revelation, draw a card.

card.name: Boundless Oath
card.text: When this creature enters, return up to two target creature cards with total mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Whenever this creature attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Redeemed Imagination
card.text: Depart 2 (You may cast this from your sanctum by exiling an Avatar permanent you control with power 2 or greater.) Flying Other Avatars and Anima you control have flying.

card.name: Reclaimed Apprehension
card.text: Depart 2 (You may cast this from your sanctum by exiling an Avatar permanent you control with power 2 or greater.) When this creature enters, you get {VB}. (Spend {V} to cast copies of Vertex spells.)

card.name: Reforged Resentment
card.text: Depart 2 (You may cast this from your sanctum by exiling an Avatar permanent you control with power 2 or greater.) {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: This creature deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

card.name: Reawakaned Savagery
card.text: Depart 2 (You may cast this from your sanctum by exiling an Avatar permanent you control with power 2 or greater.) Trample Other creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Reinvigorated Song
card.text: Depart 2 (You may cast this from your sanctum by exiling an Avatar permanent you control with power 2 or greater.) When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Ignite Relinquished Desires
card.text: This spell deals X damage to any target. If this was realized, X is one plus the number of Avatars and Anima you control. Realize {2}{I}{R} (Then if you cast this spell for its realize cost, put it onto the battlefield as a creature after it resolves.)

card.name: Vibrant Genesis
card.text: You gain 3 life and get {VU}. (Spend {V} to cast copies of Vertex spells.) Realize {4}{I}{G} (Then if you cast this spell for its realize cost, put it onto the battlefield as a creature after it resolves.)

card.name: Darken the Skies
card.text: Create three 1/1 black Spirit creature tokens with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Realize {2}{I}{W} (Then if you cast this spell for its realize cost, put it onto the battlefield as a creature after it resolves.) Decayed

card.name: Mend Lost Memories
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target land you control. Realize {4}{I}{U} (Then if you cast this spell for its realize cost, put it onto the battlefield as a creature after it resolves.) Flying

card.name: Cosmic Expansion
card.text: You draw two cards and create two 1/1 silver Avatar creature tokens. Realize—{2}{I}{B}, Sacrifice a creature (Then if you cast this spell for its realize cost, put it onto the battlefield as a creature after it resolves.)
